org.athrun.android.framework.viewelement
接口 IViewGroupElement

所有超级接口：
IViewElement
所有已知实现类：
AbsListViewElement, ViewGroupElement
public interface IViewGroupElement
extends IViewElement

Interface for Android ViewGroup.

作者：
bingyang.djj

从接口 org.athrun.android.framework.viewelement.IViewElement 继承的字段
ANR_TIME, LOG_TAG, RETRY_TIME

从接口 org.athrun.android.framework.viewelement.IViewElement 继承的方法
doClick, doClick, doLongClick, doLongClick, getHeight, getId, getLocation, getViewCenter, getWidth, isDisplayed, isEnabled, isFocused, isSelected, requestFocus, scrollBy, scrollTo
 

方法详细信息

getChildByIndex

<T extends ViewElement> T getChildByIndex(int index,
                                          java.lang.Class<T> caster)
Return child view by the given index and return type in ViewGroup.

类型参数：
T - The ViewElement subclass to return.
参数：
index - Index of the child.
caster - The ViewElement subclass to return.
返回：
Child view by the given index and return type in ViewGroup.

findElementById

<T extends ViewElement> T findElementById(java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.Class<T> caster)
Return an instance of ViewElement or its subclass by the given name.

类型参数：
T - ViewElement or its subclass.
参数：
name - String name of view id, the string after @+id/ defined in layout files.
caster - ViewElement or its subclass.
返回：
ViewElement or its subclass according to the name.

findElementByTag

<T extends ViewElement> T findElementByTag(java.lang.String name,
                                           java.lang.Class<T> caster)
Return an instance of ViewGroupElement or its subclass by the given name.

类型参数：
T - ViewGroupElement or its subclass.
参数：
name - tag of a view
caster - ViewGroupElement or its subclass.
返回：
ViewGroupElement or its subclass according to the name. added by huangqin 2013-6-4
